Question: Brane Audio, LLC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Brane Audio, LLC

Brane X Portable Speaker

- Unique rugged and portable Bluetooth speaker with a built-in subwoofer
- Claims to produce 10 times the sub-bass of other speakers in its class
- Incorporates a built-in subwoofer using Repel-Attract-Driver (R.A.D.) technology
- Features stereo sound, waterproofing, 12-hour battery life, Alexa integration, adjustable EQ, and free control app
- Four class-D digital amplifiers with combined output of over 200 watts
- High excursion 6.5" x 9" R.A.D. subwoofer, two 2.5” midrange drivers, two 0.75” dome tweeters
- Fully waterproof with an IP57 rating, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth 5.1 connectivity
- Streaming options include Spotify Connect, Pandora, Prime Music, SiriusXM, iHeartRadio, Deezer, and Tunein
- Available for $599 exclusively on braneaudio.com
